name: Ghost Run (NekiNya, el_dassy, Japetto333)
description:
Ghost Run

Explore a labyrinth and escape from the evil Ghosts!

Made in 3 days!

Controls

WASD - Move around

Shift - Run

Left Click/ Left Ctrl - Interact

Credits

El_Dassy - Music - https://el-dassy.itch.io/

Made using Unity

NavMesh2D - h8mann
